group_1.textRight: Ah~... Sorry, I got you all wet, didn't I...?
I really appreciate it.@You even lent me a hanky.

group_1.textLeft: ...No, don't worry about it.
More importantly...@I hope I wasn't interrupting anything?
If you were trying to throw yourself into the sea,@then I've stopped you from exercising your free will.
...But having witnessed it, I couldn't@simply sit by and let that happen.
So I called out to you for my own satisfaction.@I apologize for that.

group_1.textRight: Oh...no no, it's not like that!@I wasn't throwing myself in!
Um...it's a bit of an embarrassing story.

group_1.textLeft: ...You were shouting at the sea,@and got swallowed up by a large wave...?

group_1.textRight: Ehe... It's embarrassing, right?@I wanted to vent my anxiety to the sea.

group_1.textLeft: ...It isn't embarrassing, you must have@had something you wanted to shout about.

group_1.textRight: ...Um, I'm about to get married when@I graduate from high school.

group_1.textLeft: ...So, are you concerned about it?
I hear pre-marriage blues@are a common phenomenon.
Do you feel unhappy with or@dissatisfied by your fiance...?

group_1.textRight: ...No, I don't have any complaints@about him...nothing like that!
Rather, I'm just so happy because@I get to marry the person I love!

group_1.textLeft: ...Then, why? How can you be happy and worried...?

group_1.textRight: Because, even though it's great now,@maybe he'll start to hate me someday...
Look at me, I'm like this after all,@so I might get thrown away...
The more I thought about it, the more anxious I got,@and before I realized it, I was screaming at the sea.

group_1.textLeft: ...So that's how it is.

group_1.textCenter: (...There's no sense in being pessimistic when@you don't know what the future will hold.)
(And even should the future prove dim,@you'll get over it in time.)
(...But that's almost certainly not@the answer she's looking for.)

group_1.textRight: [chara:800201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...I'm sorry, I'm troubling you so much,@even though we just met.

group_1.textLeft: No, don't worry about it...@Moreover, shouldn't you go back...?

group_1.textRight: *Pant*... *Pant*... I've been looking all over for@you...! Wait, what happened?! You're soaked!

group_1.textLeft: Aha...I was messing around,@and I might've fallen into the ocean...

group_1.textRight: I was so worried about what I@would do if you'd gotten hurt.

group_1.textCenter: I'm fine. Actually, this person helped me out.

group_1.textLeft: Eh...ah, yes...

group_1.textRight: Sorry to trouble you...@And thank you so much.

group_1.textLeft: No... It was nothing...
Well then, thanks again for everything,@I'll see you around sometime~!

group_1.textCenter: (With uncertain futures@we can't know for sure exist,)
(Are people just supposed to@get over their sorrows...?)

group_1.textLeft: Money... Legal processes... None of that@is important.
If you die...@If you were gone...
Don't you ever think about how your family@would feel?

group_1.textCenter: (I wonder what kind of answer Kokoro@would give regarding love and marriage.)

group_1.textLeft: Kokoro...
